main event: A sighting of a flame-like object observed in Vandalia, Ohio on September 15, 1963.
interesting points: The object changed brightness before disappearing., The object traveled westward at an elevation of about 60 degrees., It was observed stationary at an estimated distance of about 15 miles., The sighting lasted for 4-5 minutes., The object emitted no sound.
sighted object: a flame or ball of fire
witness description: The witness's identity and details have been redacted.
